Author: silvernikki
Text: Thank you! I've been trying to make huge sweeping changes in my life and those aren't working lol, so I'm trying to make smaller changes and see if I can be okay with that. Thanks for the suggestion.   I support you too! <3 <3

Author: bailsforreal
Text: I don’t have any words of encouragement to be real af but I wouldn’t feel right just scrolling cause that’s a familiar pain to me and I don’t want you to go without at least being comforted. You’re not a failure and you are still alive to do things. Idc if you wake up 1 min earlier tomorrow and that’s the only improvement you make, you’ll still be making progress. I support you!  ❤️
